channel.title: AI on Mark's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in AI on Mark's Blog

item.title: The Flavors of Gemini
item.description: Gemini access methods, including the web app, API, and CLI, utilize distinct quota systems and billing structures. Each method operates with its own specific usage limits.

item.title: The Perfect Diet 2
item.description: Crafting a perfect diet without AI this time.

item.title: The Perfect Diet
item.description: This was a rough one! I asked AI to make me a perfect diet and meal plan. Getting the results was brutal, and the diet may surprise you.
